choices: Disput (skirt(s) & pants change back after 1 min) but other article change 5 min
Tyler and Katie try to understand was happend
The switch takes at least 10 minutes and he wants a pants out of his room
1.content:
"Why you never say that I' was telling the right thing and you were wrong?" Katie screams again.
"Because you would never admit it when you're wrong too."
"Yes I would...."
"And again you lie" Tyler stops Katies words.
"I don't..."
"You do..."

"Why can't these two be of the same opinion?" Sharon talks to herself and starts walking from the kitchen into the direction of the noise.
As she enters the living room of the house she saws her kids standing in front of the couch still argue with each other.

"Stop it. Enough is enough."
"But mom..." you two say in unison.
"No. I told you last time that if you have another disput you will have to live with the consequences."
And in the next second Sharon speaks a spell: "Tyler et Katie, Ratus ad id quod iam vobis, et post breve tempus argumenti!"

"And that was what now?" again you two ask suprised.
"Sooner or later you will see it." Sharon smiles "But now I'll go back in the kitchen and do the rest of dinner." and so she leaves Katie and Tyler.

"Great because of you mom is mad at us."
"Me...I'm pretty sure it was your fault."
"No it was..."
"Yes it is..."
Within a blink of an eye Tyler was standing in the room wearing the pink skirt once belonged his sister and Katie with the jeans of her brother.

"Suddenly it feels cold and windy at me legs....What the..." and Tyler stops his speaking only to hearing his sister starts to laugh.
"That looks great brother."
"Mooooom..." he screamed "what happend to us?"
"I told you that you will see what will happen." as Sharon enters the living room.
"But...how long it will remain this way?" Tyler stutters.
"I won't tell you. Maybe 1 h, maybe 5 min or maybe forever." and so she goes back to the kitchen.

What next?
1.title: The beginning

12.content:
"C'mon give me my pants back."
"Sorry bro, not gonna happen. They are pretty comfortable."
"Fine!"

So Tyler went upstairs to his room and change himself, but when he opens his wardrobe he realises that all his pants and shorts were no longer there.
"What the ... ? These aren't mine." as he picks a 3 buttons jeans. "Oooh no. No no no no. This can't be."
Every and single article of his pants were gone and instead of, a bunch of girly skirts, leggings... And all them belonged to his sister
"This is far more serious than I thought. I'll have to talk to Katie... But first lets take out this stupid skirt!"
"I can't see any better thing than this... Damn!" http://www.koreanfashionstore.com/korean...
He puts the pants on and his shoes back.

"Katie we ne..."
"Why are you wearing my favorite pants? You gonna ruin it!"
"Listen Katie I can..."
"Because i didn't return your pants, you gonna screw mine!?
"Thats not it Katie. Look..."
"Take it off, take it off!"
"Shut up Katie! Im trying to explain here!"
"I don't care!"

They realised what they have done. Tyler was a little bit taller than 5 secods ago.
"Oh great!"
"You... are wearing my shoes?"
http://www.sko-louboutin-danmark.pro/ima...
She takes it from his brother's feet and...
"They dont fit. They dont fit. WHY DO THEY DONT FIT!?"
"Its worst than you think. We didnt switch only the clothes we are wearing. I couldnt find anyone of my pants in my bedroom, only skirts, leggings and stuff. And as you can see, they fit me perfectly. I bet all my clothes are in your room too."

With this Katie runs to her room with a worried face. She enters the room to find out that her brother was telling the truth.
Some sneakers in a corner, one stack of shirts and male pants, where was once her cheerleader outfit was now her top and a basketball short...
She then runs to Tyler bedroom and see her collection of heels, flats, wedge sneakers... All of them in his room. She tried some of them, some skirts, jeans, leggings... Nothing fit anymore.
"See, I told you"
"We, we need to fix this out"
"Look, I thing i got it. While you were trying everything here, something came to my mind."
"Well, what it is!? Tell me!"
"Calm down, calm down. We switched shoes right now, right?"
"Right"
"I was thinking if it was random, but then I realised that my shoes was the last thing that I had put on before going downstairs and talked to you"
"Ok. We need to test this teory."
"No we don't"
"Yes we have. If we can figure it out how this course, or whatever, works, like, we can stop this from happening"
"Maybe you are allright"
"Okay, I'll take my ______ off and then we will discuss one more time"
12.title: Tyler and Katie try to understand what happend

choices: They get panik and try to change the opinion of their parents
Big disput and they switch every article for the rest of today
Make the best of it and enjoy the meal
122.content:
"Okay, I'll take my clothes off and on and then we will discuss one more time."
So Katie and Tyler went upstairs to her room.
"Sorry bro but you have to wait outside."
"Why?"
"If we have to check it, it has to be a suprise for one of us. And because it was my idea I can choose, if your theoery right, what we will switch."
So she close the door and leave Tyler with an open mouth.

5 minutes later and nothing what takes so long...
10 minutes later and still nothing Katie....
15 minutes later and it was enough for Tyler "Katiw, why it takes so long?"
"I just need time..."
"Katie..."
Suddendly Katie said happy "it works...your theoery was right. We can control what we switch but I'm pretty sure you won't be happy what we switch now.
Tyler raise an eyebow because he doesn't feel any change as Katie open the door with her shirt and Tylers boxershorts.
His eyes wide open as he sees Katie like this and open the buttons of the pants to see some pink material.

"Why do you do that?"
"Two reasons. The first is that I thought your theoery was wrong, that it was random and the secound is, as I saw you with my skirt it looked wrong on you first but that I can saw your boxers was more worst than you in my skirt. The next thing is that you should look under your shirt."
He looked undes his shirt and saw the bh he now wearing.

"Great..." and suddendly Tyler were back in his normal shoes.
"Mom told something about time and random."
"Yeah, I have my shoes back" Karie was happy and hug her favorite pair boots.
"Great Katie that you're happy but we still have these problems" and he pointtd to his lower half with the pants and underwear.

"Kids, your father takes us to a fancy restaurante for dinner. Take your best clothes we start in two hours" they mom shout from downstairs.
122.title: Panties

14.content:
Tyler went upstairs to his room to get out of the skirt when he got to his room he found that there were dresses, knee & floor length skirts then he went to his dresser where in a couple of the drawers he found skirts, mini-skirts, skorts, shorts, various girl jeans & pants

With a sigh he went into Katie's room & found his shorts, jeans & pants but when he went to try & put them on he found that they didn't fit anymore, so with a sigh he put the skirt back on & headed out where he

While he was doing that from the kitchen their mother called out to which Katie answered & was asked to run to the store to pick up a few things, but as she was putting on her pink high top wedge sneakers

http://www.ebay.com/itm/Womens-High-Heel...

she got a stray thought 'I wonder will this keep happening & if it does can we control what we swap' seeing her brother come downstairs she decided to experiment. She waited until he had put on his runners then started an argument hoping that they would switch shoes but their Mom heard them & yelled

"I don't care who goes but they need to hurry"

As she was yelling they switched...
14.title: Another swap

info.brief_description: After another dispute with your sister your mother has enough and put a spell on you two.
info.description:
The Simple Story:

Once again you has an disput with your sister about nothing but this time your mother has enough of it.
She puts a spell on you and your sister with the ability that every time you have a disput both of you switch an article of clothing.

It isn't permanently but the time you have to wear the clothes is increased with every new disput.
If you think you can change the clothes you will see that you have the rest of these articles from your sibling as well in your wardrobe.


Example:

You and your sister has an disput about the tv program and switch socks/thights/stockings for 2 hours.
In these 2h you have all the socks and co belonging to your sister and can only wear a pair of these and vice versa.


Characters:

Tyler Clarkson (You)
- 20 years old
- size 5″12 / 1,82m
- sporty guy
- trainee for car salesman

Katie Clarkson (Sister)
- 17 years old
- size 5″7 / 1,69m
- cheerleader at school

Sharon Clarkson (Mother)
- 45 years old
- size 5″9 / 1,74m
- secretary at the school

Richard Clarkson (Father)
- 50 years old
- size 5″10 / 1,78m


Rules for the spell / How it works:

- if Tyler and Katie start a disput and don't find a solution they switch an article of clothes they wear and each of the same article in there wardrobes
- every time they start a new disput and don't find a solution they have to wear these articles longer and also it switch another article
- the switch can't be reverse with another disput
- only her mother can undo the spell
- the only persons that see the switches are the family but her mother could change it so everybody would see it
- clothes will fit the new owner


Please remember to keep it:

- PG-13. Sex is allowed, but nothing explicit and don't go into the nitty gritty details
- Please advance the story! It's okay to have it come to an end, but make sure there are plenty of switches in the meantime
- Don't let the main or other characters die
- Have fun! Go wild with the swaps, think of anything you want!
